Warde Publioshers offers a series of Dual-Language titles. Current titles are German-English and Latin-English. (See tabs above.) For each title there are the following links.

a.[html] Read the publication online.
b.[Apple Book] An edition for sale at Apple.
c.[Suporting Pages] Learning resources host at Canvas LMS.

(a. and c. links are forthcoming.)


The titles are based on classics of philosophy, theology, and history. Books in the series are in the public domain unless otherwise indicated.
